definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
shadowboxing or Taiji, T'aichi or T'aichichuan/traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation/a martial art
Chinese boxing/fist and feet/punching and kicking
lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
fig. to rub one's fists and wipe one's palms (idiom)/to roll up one's sleeves for battle/eager to get into action or start on a task
empty hand, empty fist (idiom); having nothing to rely on/unarmed and defenseless

sentences.english: It is a left lead followed by a right cross.
sentences.chinese: 一个左直拳接着是一个右交叉拳。
他愤怒地用拳捶击桌子。

sentences.english: His Zanretsuken has a guard point, and his uppercut is 98 style with long invincibility.
sentences.chinese: 暂烈拳有格档效果，升龙像98一样有长时间无敌。

sentences.english: "And what are you going to do with the nice new frown?" the Pugilist asked.
sentences.chinese: “那么你打算如何处理好新皱眉？”的拳拳师问道。

sentences.english: The fistic play is the fundamental for any beginner of Baimei fistic play.
sentences.chinese: 此拳是白眉拳里最基本的入门拳。

sentences.english: He blacked her eye with that one punch.
sentences.chinese: 他用那一猛拳把她的眼眶打得发青。

sentences.english: Fist-back-hitting manipulation is mainly applied to Dazhui and the lumbosacral portion.
sentences.chinese: 拳背击法主要用于大椎及腰骶部。

sentences.english: Dabei boxing organizations to strengthen the operational capacity to broaden the sources of funding.
sentences.chinese: 要加强大悲拳组织的运作能力，拓宽资金来源。

sentences.english: Zeng Yun Winning the Champion of Men's Group C Freestyle Boxing.
sentences.chinese: 曾云以自创的“行云拳”夺得男子C组其他拳术冠军。

sentences.english: Your wife fell away from you, into the fist of God.
sentences.chinese: 你的妻子离你远去，落到上帝的拳中。

sentences.english: Lewis bobs, parries outside and counter-punches with the right cross.
sentences.chinese: 刘易斯低头躲过，向外抵挡，用右手交叉拳还击。

sentences.english: Twelve-style Boxing is advanced content for further improvement after Wuxing Quan (Five-element Boxing). During exercises, we just require true meanings not alike shapes.
sentences.chinese: 十二形拳是在五行拳之后为进一步提高的进阶内容。

sentences.english: It is a name of one kind of Quan.
sentences.chinese: 六合拳是一种拳的名称。

sentences.english: The Xingyi kungfu crossing fist is one of the five basic punching maneuvers used in Xingyi.
sentences.chinese: 兴义功夫交叉拳的五种基本冲压兴义使用演习一。

sentences.english: One problem, Pacman landed 42 that round.
sentences.chinese: 但问题是，帕奎奥在那个回合里出了42拳。

definition: palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
hand formed into a flat shape, as for a karate chop
to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel
to batter/combo (hit) (gaming)/(volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit/double contact
